title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan chic and versatile, with a soft fabric that's comfortable and non-itchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and beautiful
items.body: This sweater is super soft and cozy! The gold buttons elevate it a bit, making it versatile. The below-hip length makes it perfect over leggings. It's a great value for such a lovely sweater. Read more
items.author: Aleta

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cardigan to elevate your outfit
items.body: I wear a medium and ordered a medium and it is perfectly oversized - very comfortable and soft, great value and quality for the price. Will look great with jeans or leggings, and can be dressed up or will simply elevate a more casual outfit. Read more
items.author: CJ

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So soft and chic, but LONG
items.body: I ordered this in a medium in camel. It’s like a feathered taupe color, and the color is perfect! This cardigan isn’t heavy, but you don’t want it to be. It is really long, and the lighter weight lets it drape/ be tucked as needed. This looks so good paired with a pair of wide leg green jeans I bought from Nordstrom (tuckes in front) or hanging loose with a pair of leggings. I am 5’6” and wear a 36ddd. To fit my chest, I often am a large on Amazon, but they recommended a M to me, and in this brand that is often the case. I want to wear this buttoned, and buttons aren’t typically my friend, so I stuck with a medium for no gapping. If you only plan to wear it open, I’d size down two sizes and the drape will still be heavenly. If you aren’t busty, I’d size down 2 as well. So, so soft. This sweater is warm and cozy despite being lightweight. Perfect piece for this fall and winter. Up close, the buttons are nothing to write home about, but they give an overall great look and pull it all together. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you’re gonna order this out item order two sizes of smaller. One’s very big.
items.body: I’ll tell you it runs very very big. I had bought it for somebody. That’s really really tiny. So I am returning it. But it is very nice. Read more
items.author: Jane DelGaudio

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap fabric
items.body: Color is lovely. Buttons are nice. At a distance this is a beautiful sweater. Up close - it's cheap looking. If you typically buy clothes to wear one season then donate, this might be ok. If you buy things to last for years, this isn't one of those pieces. Read more
items.author: JK Bradley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s soft, comfortable
items.body: Really cozy sweater! The mock neck and lantern sleeves make it stylish and warm — perfect for winter. Read more
items.author: Marry

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Size down!!
items.body: It’s extremely oversized. Size down like two sizes. But it’s a cute sweater. For reference I ordered a xxl I should’ve got a large Read more
items.author: Maira

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute! Longer than expected.
items.body: Cute sweater! It’s very long so if you’re shorter, it may not be as flattering. I get compliments on the gold buttons a lot. It’s so-so quality. But good for what you pay for. I do have it in 2 colors. They’re great for leggings for sure. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Olive Green, Apricot, Black, Camel, Orange, Light Blue, Navy, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Royal Blue, Jujube Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
